txt.en: Stormwall was once a great crafting-hall of the dwarves in the Grey Mountains. Perhaps some of the trusty tools used to craft great and wondrous items still linger in these crumbling halls.
The brittle tool crumbles in your hand

'Why, look at these. They are not unlike the tools our own smiths use... fashioned by their ancestors, perhaps. See how they have weathered the years intact! One might still use them. I believe we shall.'
Stormwall was once a great crafting hall of the dwarves in the Grey Mountains.
You should bring the crafting tools to Hórin in Skarháld.
Bring the crafting tools to Hórin
You should search for old crafting tools in Stormwall.
